item.title: [pi]wtf is wrong!?
item.dc:creator: @AnonymousZ AnonymousZ
item.description:
@AnonymousZ wrote:

case 10058: if (c.playerLevel[1] == 99) if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 99000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 99000); c.getItems().addItem(9753,1); c.getItems().addItem(9754,1); c.getItems().addItem(9755,1); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 99 Defence and 99K!"); } break;

I’d LOVE an explanation for why that is wrong…

Instead of just taking 99K away it decides to take ALL the money you have away…

Why is it doing that/

Read full topic
